Spears::

The computer worked out the trainer program in a matter of minutes. 
With the chip gone, the trainer program lost and was deleted out of 
her data bases.  The computer screen read: Maximal program running.





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> I knew I was forgetting to RP someone!
> 
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm lets out a breath of relief as the trainer chip exploded, 
not 
> taking Spears with it. He walks over to the machine with her spark, 
> sliding it back across the floor and inserting the spark into 
Spears.
> 
> Attaching a few wires to her head, he taps several buttons on a 
> console, activating a program.
> 
> "Computer, change programming to neutral," he says, the computer 
> beginning to do just that.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > Spears::
> > 
> > The tiny chip expoded.  It left a small burn moark on her neck 
and 
> > nothng more. Her self destruct program wasn't activated.
